title: Pod Stuck in Terminating
content: If a pod is stuck in Terminating state, it might be due to a finalizer. Check the finalizers using `kubectl get pod <pod> -o yaml`. You can remove the finalizer using `kubectl patch pod <pod> -p '{"metadata":{"finalizers":null}}'`.

question: What is a PVC?
answer: A PersistentVolumeClaim (PVC) is a request for storage by a user. It is similar to a Pod. Pods consume node resources and PVCs consume PV resources.
